title: SOLD - 1913 T200 Fatima Cleveland Indians w/Joe Jackson (SGC 10)
author: Archive

posts.post_title: SOLD - 1913 T200 Fatima Cleveland Indians w/Joe Jackson (SGC 10)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Phil Garry
Good Afternoon, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a very nice 1913 T200 Fatima Cleveland Indians Team Card w/Joe Jackson graded an SGC 10 by the strict graders at Sportscard Guaranty Company, the industry leader in third-party grading. Sale price on this card is $450.00 dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: vguerrerobb@yahoo.com.


[IMG]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s120/bcbgcbrcb/JacksonJoe.jpg[/IMG]
